title: MJI's Dev Showcase Site
description: All About MJI and his showcase of mini and simple dev projects

home.title: Hi! I'm MJ
home.description:
A Software Engineer with 4 years of working experience. An Eager learner, hard worker and a team
player who is well-versed in multiple programming language and proficient in multimedia tools. Have
hands-on experience on developing web and mobile applications using modern javascript technologies and
other web technologies.
